mapper.select: select r_origin from reply where r_num=#{r_ref}
select r_level from reply where r_num=#{r_ref}
select max(r_step) from(select * from reply start with r_num=#{r_ref} connect by nocycle r_ref = prior r_num) where r_del='n'
mapper.update: update reply set r_step = r_step+1 where r_b_num = #{r_b_num} and r_step >= #{r_step}
update reply set r_content=#{r_content}, r_update=sysdate where r_num=#{r_num}
update reply set r_del='y' where r_num=#{r_num}
mapper.select: select a.*, b.user_profile as r_profile from user_info b inner join (select * from reply where r_b_num=#{r_b_num} order by r_step) a on b.user_id=a.r_id order by a.r_step
select count(*) from reply where r_b_num=#{r_b_num} and r_level=0

select c.*, d.user_profile as r_profile from user_info d inner join (select * from (select a.*, rownum rn from (select r.*, o.gbReply from reply r inner join (select r_origin, count(*)-1 as gbReply from reply where r_b_num=#{r_b_num} group by r_origin) o on r.r_num=o.r_origin order by r_num desc) a) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}) c on d.user_id=c.r_id
select a.*, b.user_profile as r_profile from user_info b inner join (select * from reply where r_origin=#{r_num} and r_level!=0 order by r_step) a on b.user_id=a.r_id order by a.r_step
